name: UgLee Games Classics - Save The Princess, Dragon - 2013
name_original: UgLee Games Classics - Save The Princess, Dragon - 2013
description:
Save the Princess, Dragon!  You are the dragon, in this twist of fate, and your objective is to save the Princess!  Though, the princess may be in another castle...

[ Developed in Spring 2013 ]

This is the third game in the UgLee Games Classic series. UgLee Games Classic games are designed to help me improve and experiment in programming and design. All games in the UgLee Games Classic series are free to play.
